title: Update Pls
body:
I logged on hoping to get a few urf games in before i go away for easter. and patcher decides it's not it's day
it loads 32% of the update (1.18mb  left) and then says "yea no." and an update error comes up and everything pauses

replies.body:
Try the following:

Create a new, empty file in the latest version folder "C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\0.0.1.###" named "S_OK", with no extension. Then run League in Admin mode.

I enjoy your enthusiasm. Enjoy URF!

(This is a serious problem that Riot have not address. If a red reads this, could you perhaps look over how the patcher decides whether or not files are suitable for transfer or not on a computer's hard-drive?)
how do you create a file with no extension? it just automatically make it a text document for me
